App Name: NeoMoe - AI Art Generator

App Package Name: com.art.generator.ai.moe

Brief

Embark on a digital art adventure with NeoMoe, the AI-powered art and video creator that's perfect for artists and newcomers alike. With NeoMoe, translating your ideas into mesmerizing art and videos is as easy as a few taps, thanks to a wide array of AI-driven templates and a simplistic interface tailor-made for your convenience.
